member.name: TI_FINDCHILDREN_PARAMS
member.summary: Contains type index information. It is used by the function.

member.name: TI_FINDCHILDREN_PARAMS.Start
member.summary: The zero-based index of the child from which the child indexes are to be retrieved. For example, in an array with five elements, if Start is two, this indicates the third array element. In most cases, this member is zero.

member.name: TI_FINDCHILDREN_PARAMS.ChildId
member.summary: An array of type indexes. There is one index per child.
